title: Can i be banned for using LVOC to change my voice pack to a pack thats already offered by riot?
body: I was wondering if it was possible to be banned for changing the in game language to another from a different server, for example Russian

replies.body:
Hey there,

As far as I'm aware, Riot is not currently actioning against players changing voices or sounds in their game (This can also be accomplished by changing your clients locale).

However as with any third party software that makes edits to league files or interfaces with the game in any way, there's always a possibility of the developer adding in features which may clash with Riots 'guidelines' if you will.

Riot may action on any third party tool or users of said tool at any time they see fit.
